security: This document contains Social Security numbers, the public disclosure of which "could reasonably be expected to constitute an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy." The Review Board has postponed the release of the SSNs.
summary: This document is a collection of payroll authorization forms and related memoranda for Beverly Ann Smith, an employee of the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA), detailing her employment terms, salary, and a certification regarding relationships with members of Congress.
summary_one_paragraph: This collection of documents pertains to the employment of Beverly Ann Smith at the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA). It includes payroll authorization forms outlining her appointment as a Clerk Typist effective October 31, 1977, at a salary of $11,500, and subsequent salary adjustments. The documents also contain memoranda related to her start date, salary, and a required payroll certification where she affirms she is not related to any current member of Congress. Social Security numbers mentioned in these documents have been redacted due to privacy concerns.
title: Final Determination Notification - HSCA Staff Payroll Records
recipient: Clerk of the House of Representatives; All Staff
sender: HSCA; Thomas Howarth, Budget Officer; I. Charles Mathews, Special Counsel
